about_the_game:
Yosemite Forest Ranger is a story rich emotional journey set in an open world Yosemite Valley.

It's the early 1980's. You will step in the shoes of Theodore Thompson, a retired man with an emotional history. His Grandfather used to be a Forest Ranger in the Yosemite Valley. A beautiful wilderness heavily inspired by the real world location in Yosemite National Park, USA.
This beautiful location needs a new Forest Ranger and you, as Theodore, need a break from the life you had and will return to Yosemite Valley where you spent all your summers as a young kid learning outdoor skills from your grandfather.
But why has it been so long since you last came here? What makes this beautiful place a place with beautiful memories and on the flipside such heavy and dark emotions..?
Will you be able to fill those footsteps your Grandfather left empty? Will you find the answers you're looking for? Will you have what it takes to become the next Yosemite Forest Ranger?

During Yosemite Forest Ranger you will get to know Theodore and learn what happened in his very emotional and heartbreaking past. Voice Acting queues, like memories and other artifacts play a very important role in discovering what he went through. You may find these while exploring the open world wilderness and the various POIs.

Yosemite Forest Ranger is a Community Project created by ThirstyThursten's YouTube Gaming community, and is created out of passion from Gamers for Gamers by volunteers and hobbyists.

NOTE: Before posting negative reviews or negative comments, please make sure to check the Discord for any currently known issues, to ask questions or to give feedback. We are working hard to find and apply fixes for any possible issues! Thank you for your understanding and patience! <3

Features:

  • Explore to find Recipes and up your skills and knowledge.
  • Large handcrafted open world wilderness to explore
  • Approx. Playable area: 18km2 (7mi2)
  • Drivable car and Fuel System (1 Ranger SUV, more come soon).
  • Over 14+ beautiful Points of Interest (POIs) to discover and explore.
  • Basic NPC Vendors to trade with
  • Day/Night cycle
  • Full dynamic Weather and Seasons
  • Weather and Temperature Probabilities dynamically change per Season
  • Berry Bushes (Changes with season)
  • Salary/Paycheck System (Each change of Season you'll find a Paycheck in your mailbox in the Post Office)
  • Sleep through the night or heavy weather
  • 3 different types of WilfLife (More coming soon)
  • Hunting with Bow and Arrow (if you can find them)
  • Choppable trees.
  • "Base" Building, Build cabins and houses and upgrade/furniture them based on your knowledge and skills
  • Survival aspects
  • Forage for your food
  • Cooking and Crafting
  • Interactive in-game Map
  • Controller Support
  • Farming

These features will come back into the game ASAP:

  • 2nd Car purchasable
  • Fully Voice Acted Character: Theodore Thompson
  • Rich emotional story to uncover
  • Find Casette Tapes, Letters and Newspapers with tales and info of the past
  • Cinematic Sleep Sequences
  • Small New Game tutorial

Future Ideas/Roadmap:

  • Expanding the amount of Achievements
  • Eventual Total Map size of 400km2 (154.5mi2)
  • More types of Wildlife. and Trapping system
  • Rideable Horses
  • Fishing
  • More POIs
  • Adding music and more sound design
  • Minigames/Puzzles for engagement (during nights etc)
  • Adding more and more Story content
  • Expansion of the Game area


If you like what you see and you feel like helping out in the project or giving ideas and/or feedback, join our Discord! :)

AND WISHLIST! <3

highlighted.name: I Played during Public Playtest Event and all I got was this lousy Achievement..

legal_notice:
I'm mostly a one man team, still learning. So Bugs may be there, I may need tiem to fix them. But I try my best and hardest! <3

This game has been created by TT Studios and the YouTube community over at ThirstyThursten. 
Respect each other and respect the product.
name: Yosemite Forest Ranger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gefore 1080 or AMD 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD Ryzen 7 or higher
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 2060 or AMD 7900XT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: In Yosemite Forest Ranger you will fill the shoes of Theodore Thompson. You will find out why he left the big city life to be a Forest Ranger through Story Rich Gameplay and Voice Acting. With a Survival aspect as well. A very Rich Open World with loads of Forageables and Wildlife to Explore.
